meanings.sent1: The bully's meanspirited actions made the other kids feel sad.
meanings.sent2: Her meanspirited comment hurt his feelings.
meanings.sent3: It was meanspirited of him to hide her backpack as a prank.

meanings.definition: showing a lack of generosity or compassion
meanings.sent1: The meanspirited man refused to help the homeless person.
meanings.sent2: Her meanspirited behavior towards animals was concerning.
meanings.sent3: It seemed meanspirited when she wouldn't share her snack.
meanings.sent4: The storm's meanspirited winds tore through the town.
meanings.sent5: The politician's meanspirited policies were unpopular with the public.

meanings.definition: characterized by a petty or narrow-minded attitude
meanings.sent1: His meanspirited refusal to try new things held him back.
meanings.sent2: The meanspirited gossip in the office created a toxic environment.
meanings.sent3: It was meanspirited of her to judge others based on their appearance.
meanings.sent4: The meanspirited arguments over trivial matters never seemed to end.
meanings.sent5: The meanspirited mindset limited his ability to see the bigger picture.
